tierOne.name: running head start
tierOne.description: When running away you where the first to start running and you run alittle faster.

tierTwo.name: nothing to loss
tierTwo.description: You can remove any metal resistance to prefoming an action. (ex: chopping of your arm off gets 1 degree easier)

tierThree.name: Prison Power
tierThree.description: makes might based action 1 degree easier

tierFour.name: Human Test Subject
tierFour.description: You have been exposed to all manner of horror, this give you insight into how to surive the unknown

tierFive.name: Expert Dodge
tierFive.description: You dodge it. Thats how you stay alive

tierSix.name: SCP-9341
tierSix.description: Nobody suvives this long in d-class. You are officaly anomalis...
